text: Ma go godou haihai huaidu ala ga hagaduadua ai goodou. Ma go godou huli gi daha mo Au dela ga hagi aga ai goodou. Goodou ga modongoohia di mmae mo di huaidu o di godou huli gi daha mo Au, mo di godou hagalee manawa dahi mai gi di Au dela go di godou God go Yihowah. Ko Au di godou Dagi, go Yihowah di Gowaa Aamua dela ne helekai.”
